page.title: 19Industry
page.content: The only major industrial concern in our block is a firm known as Hoechst. This company occupies a large building on the eastern side of East Winch called the Hall. Itis surrounded by very well kept grounds extending to several acres. Hoechst is an international chemical company which produces pharmaceutical products,fibres, plastics, dyes, vetinary products and reprographics, but the Hall is mainly concerned with the development of agricultural chemicals. The company's work in East Winch is based on high technology and employs comparatively few people. Consequently very few local people are employed at the Hall. The other industrial enterprise is a battery turkey farm to the north of East Winch.
